name: R5-ImmunizationEvaluation-R4-ImmunizationEvaluation
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ImmunizationEvaluation into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation`

element.display: Who is responsible for publishing the recommendations

target.display: Who is responsible for publishing the recommendations
target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.authority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.authority`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.contained`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.date`

R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 description
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseNumber[x]`

element.display: Status of the dose relative to published recommendations

target.display: Status of the dose relative to published recommendations
target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatus`

element.display: Reason why the doese is considered valid, invalid or some other status

target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatusReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.doseStatusReason`

R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.id`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.identifier`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.immunizationEvent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.immunizationEvent`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.implicitRules`

R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.meta`

R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.patient`
R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.series` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.series`

target.display: Recommended number of doses for immunity
target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.seriesDoses[x]`

R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-evaluation-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-evaluation-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: The vaccine preventable disease schedule being evaluated

target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.targetDisease` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.targetDisease`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `ImmunizationEvaluation.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ImmunizationEvaluation.text`
